website_summaries.verdict: It has a few convenient features, but others we reviewed have more to offer.
pros: Has a 68-inch cord and an easy-to-hold circular handle
cons: The plastic construction feels flimsy and the motor is not very powerful

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Careful though, if you press down on it hard into the garment it will make a hole. The blades are very sharp. I love that is electric but the cord is short so you might need an extension.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: I very much recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This fabric shaver is worth it's weight in gold. I have been able to "repair" sweaters and make them look new again. I have used the fabric shaver on numerous cashmere sweaters, gloves, and scarves. I very much recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: joie de vivre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured - Superior Quality. Easy to use & no batteries needed worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good one.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Works great. Has more power than a battery operated lint remover. Worked well on a throw rug as well as clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but only with electricity
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but only with electricity. There is no battery to work on its own. Also, if you need to clean something big, you need to clean it more often. In general, it works well
customer_reviews.author: Zlata D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I finally used this product.I was throughly impressed. I've had battery operated lint removers in the past, never have they worked to the effectiveness as this product has. I completely recommend this to anyone who is considering this item.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: So Much Better Than Battery-Powered!
customer_reviews.text: I have two battery-powered lint removers. This one is so powerful and I don't have to worry about changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Nera K. Flow

customer_reviews.title: Great for clothing care.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Corded unit so much better than needing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It shaves lint. Does the job well. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It shaves lint. Does the job well. I learned one thing however: Don't use on unsuspecting strangers.
customer_reviews.author: HappySnappyWaldo

customer_reviews.title: Going to send back
customer_reviews.text: Cheap workmanship. The very first time I used this, the plastic container that holds the lint fell off. Then, the cover over the shaver part fell off. Didn't do a good job on my clothes either. Waste of money, I'm going to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sweater shaver did a great job of removing the piling
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sweater shaver to work on my living room area rug. The sweater shaver did a great job of removing the piling. Took me an hour to do the job though. Also I had to take off the blade inside the shaver too frequently as it would get stuck with the piling.
customer_reviews.author: Med443

customer_reviews.title: great for sweaters
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Can't seem to find one that matches up to what I had years ago, but at least this plugs in.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walden

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped this would rejuvenate my cotton sweaters, but, they look only slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: Lstring

customer_reviews.title: It's really good to have
customer_reviews.text: Wow this really removes lint from your clothes. It's really good to have.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hills

customer_reviews.title: Product is subpar and does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This shaver doesn't work AT ALL. I bought it years ago and never got around to returned it.
customer_reviews.author: theo

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, saved my jacket. It will tear fine material if you hold it down firmly, so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  I use it a lot  and it works GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I use it a lot and it works GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Longmuir, C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Job. Works much faster than any other we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is hilarious due to errors in English. But product totally work. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R Messer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! This thing brings my clothes back to life!
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. It removes all lint from clothing without any problem, and the clothing looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It said that it would work on carpets.....It does not, it is now filed in a drawer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this device. It makes old sweaters look new and having a cord vs batteries gives it so much power. I started with a conair sweater shaver but wore it out quickly. I've used this one equally as much and it's still going strong. It does work best on thicker knit sweaters. I use a much lighter touch on thinner sweaters and only sometimes dare to try it on t shirts....it can cause holes if the fabric is too thin, as I have learned. Overall I completely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane K. Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sad...had to send back. Cheaply made, plug was not grounded!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: made in china
customer_reviews.text: cheap. ineffective. The directions are poorly written (i.e. "Blades is keenness, be caution to avoid injury"). Returning it after shaving half of my first sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hold on tight!
customer_reviews.text: This is the miracle I was hoping for when I bought this. It took my favorite shirt that was smothered in little fuzz balls and made it glorious again. So smooth & slinky 😍😍 It has so much more power than battery operated versions. The reason I made my title "Hold on tight" is because this sucker has so much power that it sucks up the fabric and caused a tiny hole (which I stitched back up, no biggie but least now I know). You need to use it on a flat surface like a table and hold the fabric tight and move slowly. My clothing is all like new again. I'm completely in love.
customer_reviews.author: Ray of Light

customer_reviews.title: Lint Remover,Sweater Shaver - Extra Long 68"... Iuvolux
customer_reviews.text: This shaver works quite well -- similarly to others I've owned. The big difference is that one doesn't have to worry about batteries, as it is electric and comes with a nice, long cord.
customer_reviews.author: psychmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's not as convenient as a battery operated one but this one works very well. I like the fact that you don't have to slow down when the battery begins to wear down. It's not as convenient having to plug it in but I love it
customer_reviews.author: janee

customer_reviews.title: The directions on the package are hard to follow due to bad English translation but I figured it out and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Powerful for such a small, handheld device! Used it on my sofa, sweaters, throw pillows, and even canvas shows that had some loose strings and fuzzy bits. Instantly refreshes items...they look brand new! The directions on the package are hard to follow due to bad English translation but I figured it out and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: This fabric shaver works great. It gets off lint on thin fabrics
customer_reviews.text: This fabric shaver works great. It gets off lint on thin fabrics. I like the fact that it plugs in and batteries aren't used. I wish it came with extra blades. I've bought another one when the first one's blades became dull.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Skocich

customer_reviews.title: and feels like the other might break soon
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but one of the nubbins on the lint compartment has already broken off, and feels like the other might break soon. It fills up often so be aware when you remove and replace that it is kind of delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Sunstar66

customer_reviews.title: I finally used the lint mover and it removed all the lint balls making my items look like new. I have told everyone i know about ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at this lint remover. I have a jogging suit i received as a gift last year and had stopped wearing it because of link ball. I finally used the lint mover and it removed all the lint balls making my items look like new. I have told everyone i know about this lint remover.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Takes forever to get all the pills off. Have to go over it several times. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is very poorly made. The lint receptacle won't stay on, and the second time I used this thing the shaving head came off while I was using it, and the three little razor blades inside went flying all over the room.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater shaver
customer_reviews.text: I love this clothes shaver. Easy to use and does a wonderful job. Have had battery ones before and this one beats the battery one hands down. I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's quite noisy but works well. Just don't apply too much pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle on clothes with no tugging. The lint ...
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle on clothes with no tugging. The lint remover is a little awkward; a true lint brush is more effective, but this is convenient if you're touching up a piece in one go.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job of removing those nuscence balls on clothing..
customer_reviews.author: Mator

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay does the job over priced. I though it would have been better made for the extra bucks..
customer_reviews.author: Veronica R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my mom who is 94. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom who is 94. She likes how well it works on her clothes. She especially likes the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: What's the warranty, the lint trap doesn't stay on and mine quit working.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: so time will tell but I've used it on three sweaters and I love it! My sweaters look brand new
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday..so time will tell but I've used it on three sweaters and I love it! My sweaters look brand new. It fills up quickly but works great. It doesn't require batteries which is great and the cord is long enough to move around without disturbing fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McQuiller

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, hasn't since day ONE!! It will turn on, but will NOT shave anything!! Smh
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Belk

customer_reviews.title: It's a "must have" at home!  5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and it works! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. We bought two more for our daughters
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome, filled fuzz chamber fast.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome so sharp it bit a hole in my shirt, my fault, didn't have it flat. Was disappointed it didn't come with instructions or tips on usage
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sturtevant

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully, removes lint and pills fast and easily
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully, removes lint and pills fast and easily. My husband borrowed it and he commented on how well it worked, too.
customer_reviews.author: Korie Boudreaux-Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works well and I love the cord
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I love the cord. I breezed through s stack of things that so needed some TLC!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty amazing. I own a ton of cashmere and now it looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Thail Davis

customer_reviews.title: piece of JUNK! broke the first time I used ...
customer_reviews.text: piece of JUNK ! broke the first time I used it !
customer_reviews.author: Noel C. Richetti
